Accounts injected from any of these exte: Accounts injected from any of these extensions will appear in this application and be available for use. The above list is updated as more extensions with external signing capability become available.
Amount to delegate for any democracy vot: Amount to delegate for any democracy vote. This is adjusted using the available funds on the account.
An URL that is linked to this identity.
An encrypted backup file will be created: An encrypted backup file will be created once you have pressed the "Download" button. This can be used to re-import your account on any other machine.
Any account set as proxy will be able to: Any account set as proxy will be able to perform actions in place of the proxied account
Any democracy vote performed by the dele: Any democracy vote performed by the delegated account will result in an additional vote from the delegating account
Consider storing your account in a signe: Consider storing your account in a signer such as a browser extension, hardware device, QR-capable phone wallet (non-connected) or desktop application for optimal account security.
Create a backup file for this account: Create a backup file for this account
Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are: Derivation for Ledger-type accounts are only available on mnemonic seeds.
Determines what cryptography will be use: Determines what cryptography will be used to create this account. Note that to validate on Polkadot, the session account must use "ed25519".
Either approve or reject this call.
Ensure that the extension has accounts,: Ensure that the extension has accounts, some accounts are visible globally and available for this chain and that you gave the application permission to access accounts from the extension to use them.
Ensure that you utilized the \"Save\" fu: Ensure that you utilized the "Save" functionality before using a generated address to receive funds. Without saving the address any funds and the associated seed any funds sent to it will be lost.
Ensure you are using a strong password f: Ensure you are using a strong password for proper account protection.
For approvals outstanding approvers will: For approvals outstanding approvers will be shown, for hashes that should be cancelled the first approver is required.
For final approvals, the actual full cal: For final approvals, the actual full call data is required to execute the transaction
Future versions of the web-only interfac: Future versions of the web-only interface will drop support for non-external accounts, much like the IPFS version.
I have saved my mnemonic seed safely: I have saved my mnemonic seed safely
If the delegated account is currently vo: If the delegated account is currently voting in a referendum, the delegating vote and conviction will be added.
If the recipient account is new, the bal: If the recipient account is new, the balance needs to be more than the existential deposit. Likewise if the sending account balance drops below the same value, the account will be removed from the state.
If you add several proxy accounts for th: If you add several proxy accounts for the same proxy type (e.g 2 accounts set as proxy for Governance), then any of those 2 accounts will be able to perfom governance actions on behalf of the proxied account
If you are moving accounts between appli: If you are moving accounts between applications, ensure that you use the correct type.
It is recommended that you create/store: It is recommended that you create/store your accounts securely and externally from the app. On {{yourBrowser}} the following browser extensions are available for use -
Multisig message with call (for final ap: Multisig message with call (for final approval)
Name given to this account to uniquely i: Name given to this account to uniquely identity the account to yourself.
Name given to this account. You can chan: Name given to this account. You can change it at any point in the future.
Name given to this account. You can edit: Name given to this account. You can edit it. To use the account to validate or nominate, it is a good practice to append the function of the account in the name, e.g "name_you_want - stash".
Name given to this multisig. You can edi: Name given to this multisig. You can edit it at any later point in time.
Name given to this proxied account. You: Name given to this proxied account. You can edit it at any later point in time.
One or more extensions are detected in y: One or more extensions are detected in your browser, however no accounts has been injected.
Password are ignored for hex seed: Password are ignored for hex seed
Please make sure to save this file in a: Please make sure to save this file in a secure location as it is required, together with your password, to restore your account.
Provide the account QR from the module/e: Provide the account QR from the module/external application for scanning. Once detected as valid, you will be taken to the next step to add the account to your list.
Proxied account has no owned proxies: Proxied account has no owned proxies
Save this backup file in a secure locati: Save this backup file in a secure location. Additionally, the password associated with this account is needed together with this backup file in order to restore your account.
Select a contact or paste the address yo: Select a contact or paste the address you want to send funds to.
Select the JSON key file that was downlo: Select the JSON key file that was downloaded when you created the account. This JSON file contains your private key encrypted with your password.
Select the account you wish to recover i: Select the account you wish to recover into this account.
Should the search be case sensitive, e.g: Should the search be case sensitive, e.g if you select "no" your search for "Some" may return addresses containing "somE" or "sOme"...
Since some extensions, such as the polka: Since some extensions, such as the polkadot-js extension, protects you against all community reported phishing sites, there are valid reasons to use them for additional protection, even if you are not storing accounts in it.
Since the multisig function like any oth: Since the multisig function like any other account, once created it is available for selection anywhere accounts are used and needs to be funded before use.
Soft derivation paths are not allowed on: Soft derivation paths are not allowed on ed25519
Supply a backed-up JSON file, encrypted: Supply a backed-up JSON file, encrypted with your account-specific password.
Swap to a non-executing approval type, w: Swap to a non-executing approval type, with subsequent calls providing the actual call data.
The account password as specified when c: The account password as specified when creating the account. This is used to encrypt the backup file and subsequently decrypt it when restoring the account.
The account type that you wish to create: The account type that you wish to create. This is the top-level derivation.
The account you will send funds from.
The address index (derivation on account: The address index (derivation on account) to use
The address index on the account that yo: The address index on the account that you wish to add. This is the second-level derivation.
The address that has previously setup a: The address that has previously setup a proxy to one of the accounts that you control.
The address that you have a valid proxy: The address that you have a valid proxy setup for.
The addresses that are able to approve m: The addresses that are able to approve multisig transactions. You can select up to {{maxHelpers}} trusted addresses.
The addresses that are able to help in r: The addresses that are able to help in recovery. You can select up to {{maxHelpers}} trusted helpers.
The amount to allocate and the convictio: The amount to allocate and the conviction that will be applied to all votes made on a referendum.
The beneficiary will have access to the: The beneficiary will have access to the transferred fees when the transaction is included in a block.
The call data for this transaction match: The call data for this transaction matching the hash. Once sent, the multisig will be executed against this.
The call hash from the list of available: The call hash from the list of available and unapproved calls.
The call hashes that have not been execu: The call hashes that have not been executed as of yet.
The conviction that will be used for eac: The conviction that will be used for each delegated vote.
The delay between vouching and the avail: The delay between vouching and the availability of the recovered account.
The derivation path allows you to create: The derivation path allows you to create different accounts from the same base mnemonic.
The derivation path is only relevant whe: The derivation path is only relevant when deriving keys from a mnemonic.
The derivation will be constructed from: The derivation will be constructed from the values you specify.
The email address associated with this i: The email address associated with this identity.
The existing account password as specifi: The existing account password as specified when this account was created or when it was last changed.
The full account balance to be transferr: The full account balance to be transferred, minus the transaction fees
The helpers should be able to verify, vi: The helpers should be able to verify, via an off-chain mechanism, that the account owner indeed wishes to recover access and as such provide any approvals. In the cases of malicious recovery procedures, they will have the power to stop it.
The legal name for this identity.
The local name for this account. Changin: The local name for this account. Changing this does not affect your on-line identity, so this is only used to indicate the name of the account locally.
The maximum amount you can delegate is t: The maximum amount you can delegate is the amount of funds available on the delegating account.
The minimum amount that an account shoul: The minimum amount that an account should have to be deemed active
The name for this account and how it wil: The name for this account and how it will appear under your addresses. With an on-chain identity, it can be made available to others.
The name for this account as it will app: The name for this account as it will appear under your accounts.
The name is for unique identification of: The name is for unique identification of the account in your owner lists.
The name that will be displayed in your: The name that will be displayed in your accounts list.
The network from which this account was: The network from which this account was originally generated is different than the network you are currently connected to. Once imported ensure you toggle the "allow on any network" option for the account to keep it visible on the current network.
The new account password. Once set, all: The new account password. Once set, all future account unlocks will be performed with this new password.
The operation type to apply. For approva: The operation type to apply. For approvals both non-final and final approvals are supported.
The password and password confirmation f: The password and password confirmation for this account. This is required to authenticate any transactions made and to encrypt the keypair.
The password previously used to encrypt: The password previously used to encrypt this account.
The password to unlock the selected acco: The password to unlock the selected account.
The private key for your account is deri: The private key for your account is derived from this seed. This seed must be kept secret as anyone in its possession has access to the funds of this account. If you validate, use the seed of the session account as the "--key" parameter of your node.
The recipient is associated with a known: The recipient is associated with a known phishing site on {{url}}
The recipient is associated with a known phishing site, {{url}}
The recoverable account is protected aga: The recoverable account is protected against the loss of seed/access by a social process.
The secret seed value for this account. Ensure that you keep this in a safe place, with access to the seed you can re-create the account.
The selected account to perform the deri: The selected account to perform the derivation on.
The sender is associated with a known ph: The sender is associated with a known phishing site, {{url}}
The signatories has the ability to creat: The signatories has the ability to create transactions using the multisig and approve transactions sent by others.Once the threshold is reached with approvals, the multisig transaction is enacted on-chain.
The signatory to send the approval/cance: The signatory to send the approval/cancel from
The threshold for approval should be les: The threshold for approval should be less or equal to the number of signatories for this multisig.
The threshold for approvals and the dela: The threshold for approvals and the delay is the protection associated with the account. The delay should be such that any colluding recovery attempts does have a window to stop.
The threshold of vouches that is to be r: The threshold of vouches that is to be reached for the account to be recovered.
The transaction, after application of th: The transaction, after application of the transfer fees, will drop the available balance below the existential deposit. As such the transfer will fail. The account needs more free funds to cover the transaction fees.

The transaction, after application of the transfer fees, will drop the balance below the existential deposit. As such the transfer will fail. The account needs more funds to cover the transaction fees.
The transferred balance will be subtract: The transferred balance will be subtracted (along with fees) from the sender account.
The twitter name for this identity.
There is an existing reference count on: There is an existing reference count on the sender account. As such the account cannot be reaped from the state.
These are trusted individuals that can v: These are trusted individuals that can verify and approve any recovery actions. With recovery, once the threshold is reached, the funds associated with the account can be moved to a new destination.
This account has a governance delegation: This account has a governance delegation
This account is available on all network: This account is available on all networks. Ensure you tie it to a specific network via the account options ("only this network" option) to limit availability on a single network.

This account is available on all networks. Ensure you tie it to a specific network via the account options ("only this network" option) to limit availability on a single network. For accounts from eg. an extension, use the extension itself to set the network.

This account is available on all networks. It is recommended to link to a specific network via the account options ("only this network" option) to limit availability. For accounts from an extension, set the network on the extension.
This account is recoverable, with the fo: This account is recoverable, with the following friends:
This does not send any transaction, rath: This does not send any transaction, rather is only sets the genesis in the account JSON.
This is a development account derived fr: This is a development account derived from the known development seed. Do not use for any funds on a non-development network.
This is a development account derived from the known development seed. Do now use for any funds on a non-development network.
This is an invalid derivation path.
This is especially prudent in cases wher: This is especially prudent in cases where the address is only destined to be used on a single network or linked to a specific device.
This password is used to encrypt your pr: This password is used to encrypt your private key. It must be strong and unique! You will need it to sign transactions with this account. You can recover this account using this password together with the backup file (generated in the next step).
This will apply to any future use of thi: This will apply to any future use of this account as stored on this browser. Ensure that you securely store this new password and that it is strong and unique to the account.
Total amount of fund that will be reserv: Total amount of fund that will be reserved. These funds are returned when the identity is cleared
Transfer the full account balance, reap: Transfer the full account balance, reap the sender
Type here what you would like your addre: Type here what you would like your address to contain. This tool will generate the keys and show the associated addresses that best match your search. You can use "?" as a wildcard for a character.
Type the amount you want to transfer. No: Type the amount you want to transfer. Note that you can select the unit on the right e.g sending 1 milli is equivalent to sending 0.001.
Type the password chosen at the account: Type the password chosen at the account creation. It was used to encrypt your account's private key in the backup file.
We will provide you with a generated bac: We will provide you with a generated backup file after your account is created. As long as you have access to your account you can always download this file later by clicking on "Backup" button from the Accounts section.
With the keep-alive option set, the acco: With the keep-alive option set, the account is protected against removal due to low balances.
You can set a custom derivation index fo: You can set a custom derivation index for this account
You can set a custom derivation path for: You can set a custom derivation path for this account using the following syntax "/<soft-key>//<hard-key>". The "/<soft-key>" and "//<hard-key>" may be repeated and mixed`. An optional "///<password>" can be used with a mnemonic seed, and may only be specified once.
You can set a custom derivation path for this account using the following syntax "/<soft-key>//<hard-key>///<password>". The "/<soft-key>" and "//<hard-key>" may be repeated and mixed`.

You can set a custom derivation path for this account using the following syntax "/<soft-key>//<hard-key>///<password>". The "/<soft-key>" and "//<hard-key>" may be repeated and mixed`. The "///password" is optional and should only occur once.
You can set a custom derivation path for this account using the following syntax "m/<purpose>/<coin_type>/<account>/<change>/<address_index>
You don't have any accounts. Some featur: You don't have any accounts. Some features are currently hidden and will only become available once you have accounts.
You have {{claimCount}} accounts that ne: You have {{claimCount}} accounts that need attestations. Use the Claim Tokens app on the navigation bar to complete the process. Until you do, your balances for those accounts will not be reflected.
You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions: You have {{upgradableCount}} extensions that need to be updated with the latest chain properties in order to display the correct information for the chain you are connected to. This update includes chain metadata and chain properties.
You should not setup proxies to act as a: You should not setup proxies to act as a self-proxy.
You will remove any delegation made by t: You will remove any delegation made by this acccount
Your ethereum key pair is derived from y: Your ethereum key pair is derived from your private key. Don't divulge this key.
Your password contains at least one \"/\: Your password contains at least one "/" character. Disregard this warning if it is intended.
a riot name linked to this identity: a riot name linked to this identity
name: name
